Projects.Name: QuickSwap
Projects.Description: QuickSwap is a permissionless decentralized exchange (DEX) running on the Polygon network.

Projects.Name: PolyMarket
Projects.Description: PolyMarket is a prediction market platform built on the Polygon network.

Projects.Name: Uniswap
Projects.Description: Uniswap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) protocol running on the Ethereum blockchain.

Projects.Name: SushiSwap
Projects.Description: SushiSwap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) protocol and AMM running on the Ethereum blockchain.

Projects.Name: Compound
Projects.Description: Compound is a decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol running on the Ethereum blockchain.
